about_the_game:
Play Frontier for Free Today!

Frontier is a competitive, third-person battle royale game developed by a high-schooler. Play solo or with friends, fill your game with bots, and choose between Classic BR or the fast-paced Endgame BR mode. Whichever mode you pick, your ultimate goal is to be the last one alive on the island.

Pick up various weapons, stay inside the zone, and work your way to victory. Each round lasts 5-8 minutes, with continuous lobbies so you can jump into the action without constantly searching for matches. Frontier features an in-game text chat, which you can use to talk to friends or players in your session.

Frontier can be played on lower-end PCs and school laptops, using DirectX11, Shader Model 5, and Unreal Engine 4's classic graphics. With limited awareness of Frontier, it’s much less likely to be blocked in school compared to more popular games.

Earn XP by getting kills and placing highly to level up and unlock new heroes and backpacks. Aim for level 40 to unlock the ultimate hero for this season.

With challenging bots, cartoony graphics, and competitive gameplay, Frontier is great for playing in school or casual gaming sessions. Hop in today and see if you can secure that Frontier Victory Achievement!

name: Frontier: Battle Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 core / 4 thread CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 / SM5 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Frontier is a third-person battle royale created by a 15-year-old game developer. Play solo and compete against bots or join public matches to fight for victory on a stylized map, all while earning XP to unlock skins and backpacks. Can be played on lower-end PC's and school laptops.
